UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The design of a cell-selective fowlicidin-1-derived peptide with both antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities.
Literature.Author: Rajasekaran G, Kumar SD, Yang S, Shin SY
